akn:section.akn:heading: Other claims against dissolved limited liability company.

akn:content.akn:p: A dissolved limited liability company may publish notice of its dissolution and request persons having claims against the company to present them in accordance with the notice.
The notice authorized by subsection (a) of this section shall:

If a dissolved limited liability company publishes a notice in accordance with subsection (b) of this section, unless the claimant commences an action to enforce the claim against the company within 3 years after the publication date of the notice, the claim of each of the following claimants shall be barred:
A claim not barred under this section or ยง 29-807.03 may be enforced:
